external.description: For decades, Eve Baer remained convinced that her son, unresponsive after a severe brain injury, was still conscious. Science eventually proved her right.
external.title: The Mother Who Never Stopped Believing Her Son Was Still There

record.text:
"'Ian, are you conscious or are you a vegetable?' Geoff teased during one of my visits. 'I think you’re a vegetable. I think you look like a kumquat.'"

From fascinating, tragic, harrowing, heartwarming story of brain injury & consciousness.

www.theatlantic.com/magazine/arc...

external.title: Trump Is Offering Putin Another Munich
external.description: Hitler didn’t want a peace deal, and neither does Putin.

posts.content:
"Let’s start with security guarantees. Putin has never agreed to them for Ukraine—in any form"

Read Bob Kagan on the Trump capitulation to Russia 
https://www.theatlantic.com/international/archive/2025/03/putin-hitler-munich-parallel/681973/?gift=hVZeG3M9DnxL4CekrWGK33lS72YP7RNIe2NXscBnxos&utm_source=copy-link&utm_medium=social&utm_campaign=share

"Everyone in the West seems to agree that there will be a cease-fire in Ukraine at some point. But one person who never talks about a cease-fire is Vladimir Putin. He does not talk about a cease-fire with his own people. He has at no time offered a cease-fire to the Ukrainians or the Americans."

external.description: The billionaire Trump enforcer told federal workers they needed to justify themselves—or else. Then the administration changed its mind.
external.title: Elon Musk’s Empty Ultimatum

record.text: “The federal government’s main personnel agency, which had sent Saturday’s government-wide email, had quietly instructed agencies midday Monday that a response was voluntary. Those instructions effectively rescinded Musk’s threats.”

external.title: Elon Musk’s Empty Ultimatum
external.description: The billionaire Trump enforcer told federal workers they needed to justify themselves—or else. Then the administration changed its mind.

posts.content: “The federal government’s main personnel agency, which had sent Saturday’s government-wide email, had quietly instructed agencies midday Monday that a response was voluntary. Those instructions effectively rescinded Musk’s threats.”
“The shifting and contradictory instructions divided Trump’s Cabinet, and for the first time, created daylight between Musk and the White House.”

external.description: The dismissal of the chairman of the Joint Chiefs of Staff came as part of a broader shakeup throughout the military’s senior ranks.

record.text: Be clear about what you are seeing. The firing of these senior officers has nothing to do with competence. This is creating an oath of loyal by the Armed Forces to the Leader. We face an uncertain future.

external.description: Changing your perception and withholding your attention are great ways of regaining control over online abuse.

external.title: DOGE Has ‘God Mode’ Access to Government Data
external.description: The president’s special commission now has an unprecedented ability to view and manipulate information at many federal agencies.

posts.content: NEW: Two weeks ago gov't IT experts warned us that the worst case scenario would be if DOGE got full admin access to agency systems. We can report at at least one agency DOGE has unfettered "god mode" access. Our latest: https://www.theatlantic.com/technology/archive/2025/02/doge-god-mode-access/681719/?gift=bQgJMMVzeo8RHHcE1_KM0QpD_QLH9WHzx7gEywUfx3I&utm_source=copy-link&utm_medium=social&utm_campaign=share

anyhow, i realize there's an unbelievable amt of information out there and its overwhelming and we've really tried to only put stuff out when we felt we could add context. and it feels like this notion of unfettered access is noteworthy, especially if this is the playbook at other agencies

external.description: A perfect suit, made by an expert tailor out of superlative fabric, would do nothing less than transform me.

posts.content:
"When I finally found people to have sex with me—I had to attend Oberlin to complete the task—my expression upon disrobing resembled that of a dog looking up at his mistress after a bowel movement of hazmat proportions."

https://www.theatlantic.com/magazine/archive/2025/03/gary-shteyngart-bespoke-suit-mens-fashion-self-love/681441/

record.text: During a deposition last year, Rupert Murdoch sat next to his lawyer who argued—explicitly—that Fox News is successful because it gives viewers what they want, and then cited its post-2020 election denial coverage as an example. The candor is pretty wild: www.theatlantic.com/magazine/arc...

posts.content: During a deposition last year, Rupert Murdoch sat next to his lawyer who argued—explicitly—that Fox News is successful because it gives viewers what they want, and then cited its post-2020 election denial coverage as an example. The candor is pretty wild: https://www.theatlantic.com/magazine/archive/2025/04/rupert-murdoch-family-succession-james-murdoch/681675/?gift=66OeTwjwIWd7-zlTK2lFDrJDsvLJ9N9QNLI6Ec4OkTY&utm_source=copy-link&utm_medium=social&utm_campaign=share

James Murdoch describes the Fox News formula: "Lying to your audience is how you juice ratings." What will happen to the channel when Rupert dies? James's wife Kathryn isn't sure it can be reformed: “It doesn’t have a clear purpose in the ecosystem anymore.” https://www.theatlantic.com/magazine/archive/2025/04/rupert-murdoch-family-succession-james-murdoch/681675/?gift=66OeTwjwIWd7-zlTK2lFDnQ0pXL8cjUYLtokimT8nCM&utm_source=copy-link&utm_medium=social&utm_campaign=share
